column1: # 1. Fill in all required fields below
# 2. Keep the header row exactly as shown
# 3. You can keep these instruction lines - they will be ignored during upload
# 5. Use exactly 10 digits for phone (no +91 prefix)
# 7. Use ABCDE1234F format for panCard (5 letters + 4 digits + 1 letter)
# 9. Addresses with commas should be in quotes: "123 Main St
# 10. Save as CSV format before uploading
